name: as Ripley
description:
Ripley is aware but unable to speak. Sometimes Ripley hears things that are not there, feels things that don't make any sense and sees things that are not real. Ripley can move and charge hirs little flashlight though. That should help with the very real doors and the very real ghosts. You play as Ripley. The first game of Gentle Games, a portuguese game development studio born at the Brackeys 2022.1 GameJam (Diogo Sousa, José Quintino, Iuri Landolt, João Vidigueira)

Follow us on Twitter
